comment: Ms. HB is an excellent instructor for those who find themselves having to take Algebra 1111/98.  She has been a life saver for someone who hasn't worked a formula or equation in a really long time.  Don't be afraid to ask questions, that's what she's there for.  Like most things, you get out of her class what your willing to put in to it.
Professor HB is amazing .She breaks down mathematical problems into easy to understand problems. Will always be there for you if you need any help. I wish she could teach all my other math classes

I would not have passed this class if it weren't for Mrs HB. She is an excellent teacher. She teaches math in a way that makes it easy to understand. I thoroughly enjoyed her class. I would recommend her class to anyone. Textbook isn't needed, but you will definitely need a calculator.

Wonderful person, very helpful and always willing to go over any part of the lesson you didn't understand the first time around. My only problem was the lack of control over her class. You usually would have to stay after class for extra help because you cannot hear the lesson because some the students would talk over her yelling incorrect answers.

Absolutely amazing professor. If I missed a class, it was easy to catch up but I still hated missing because she's just so great. She really cares about what her students do. She takes time to explain everything and doesn't move on until everyone understands. Cannot say enough good things about her as a teacher and person.

Wonderful, Wonderful, wonderful teacher!! She is very patient and super attentive. She even made worksheets so that we could further understand the work. She informs you of what is and isn't on the test, so you don't do any unnecessary studying. I aced every unit exam. I wish she taught MA0098. :(

I was put in this class b/c I didn't "pass" the COMPASS test even though I took advanced trig the year prior, so I really wasn't looking forward to it. Yes, the course was extremely easy. Yes, I got A's on every test without studying or using book. But Ms. HB was very nice, very helpful for students that needed her help, and was always on time.

She sometimes gets off topic  but overall a good teacher.  I HATE math and was very nervous about her class after reading the previous reviews but I finished the class with an A.  Just pay attention and do your homework and you'll pass.
Good teacher. Showed us the easiest way of doing things and cut out the B.S.
She ended up leaving temporary, but for the little time I had her she was great. She showed different ways doing the problems. I feel very lucky having her as my teacher even if it was a short time.

I don't understand why she's gotten bad comments in the past.  I found her very nice and extremely helpful.  And I don't understand why comments were made about her losing control of her class - didn't happen during my class.
My fellow math deficient students-if you want to get of learning classes, do not take this person! It looks like the other comments covered what I wanted to say! Good luck!

Ms HB took extra time for students outside of class if needed. She gave students several options to get help email, phone, or appts. Since I never took Alegbra before I was happy she made it easy to make a good grade.

I will keep it simple. Her teachingmethod does not translate to a college setting. It does not mean she will not eventually learn how to, but since I have to pay for school, my time is valuable. I had to pay for a tutor to get through her class. She had no order to her classes, people talked over her and was frustrating for us who wanted to learn

She was helpful and explained how to work a problem several different ways, and was helpful how to use the calculator on most problems. Very flexible about class attendance, but you have to be there to pass as she stated. I would recommend her to students who need a little extra attention in Math. VERY NICE AND HELPFUL!!!

I am sure is feared and loved by her high school students-even when asked repeatedly to explain how to solve a problem from beginning to end, it never happened. Also had no control of the class, middle aged adults interrupting her as if they are the only two in the class-totally frustrating

This teacher does not teach well. She does not explain things well AT ALL and was CONSTANTLY making mistakes that confused many. She even gave us the wrong answers on our final exam study guide. I do not recommend unless you plan on skipping the class anyway.
